title: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67
medium: Transparent watercolor, white gouache on white wove paper
inscribed:
Upper left, graphite: No 6
Upper right, graphite: 738
description: Huntsmen and dogs at crossroads, trees in foreground, pink and blue sky in background; scene is framed in scrolled gold accented with grotesque masks and delicate green leaves; leafy branches extend from each side of frame

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67.Transparent watercolor, white gouache on white wove paper. Gift of M. Roy Fisher. 1976-105-7.
